name: 鬼人偶/Ghost Doll
description:
"If this continues, mother will......" Before the collapse of winnie, can return to the mother's side?Find a way to escape this place!

◆《鬼人偶/Ghost Doll》 is a classic pixel-wise puzzle game that uses acquired items to solve puzzles, unravel the truth, and save poor souls. In order to get back to mom, move on.



-How to operate-

WASD/Left mouse button：movement
Spacebar/Enter/Z/Left mouse button：interactive/Click Confirm
Esc：Exit/Open the menu
F4: full screen/windowing

This game has 7 endings.

〖The game features〗


■ Strange events that make people puzzled.

■A dark fairy tale, a sigh.

■Unique style, weird and cute.








Author's words:
This game is my first time to make it. If it gives you a bad game experience, I'm sorry.
If possible, I hope you can make some suggestions.
My English is not good, if the translation is not good, I am sorry.

Finally, thank you for playing my game!
